About Us

What is Tradeshield?

Tradeshield is a new robust service on Dubai Trade that enables customers to apply and obtain standard insurance policies online. It has been created to further streamline trade processes, converting manual procedures to faster more convenient electronic transactions. Creating a true one stop shop for all shipping related services.

How will Tradeshield improve the way you do business?

  • Enjoy worry free safe shipments by protecting your cargo
  • Get competitive premium rates and enhanced terms on policies from various leading insurance providers, giving you the option to compare multiple quotations
  • Eliminate paper work and physical counter visits with this easy fully automated process
  • Obtain real time quotations immediately as soon as the form is submitted
    *depending on the insurance provider and quotation requirements, look for this icon realtime-quota-icon
  • Convert the quotation to a policy online with a just a few clicks
  • Online payment for policy through Rosoom, Dubai Tradeâ€™s secure e-payment gateway
